    Web Design with Django

    Oct 2019 » Python Django

    A full-fledged web designing task is done in this project from designing the website from scratch using the Django framework till hosting it in popular free services like ‘pythonanywhere.com’ and ‘heroku.com’.

    Part 1

    Sample blogging website using a template from Bootstrapious. Project is hosted in pythonanywhere. The website can be accessed at rahulrajpl.pythonanywhere.com

    Part 2

    This is a real project I have done for a good friend of mine. A portfolio website using Django and hosted on to heroku. Final page can be accessed at kartiktect.herokuapp.com

    Learning

    • Django basics
    • Django project hosting
    • Bootstrap
    • Porting basic bootstrap templates to Django
